#summary Catching exceptions.
#labels Tutorial

= Try/Catch =

The definition is:
{{{
     e ^
          "".substring(0, -1)
     ^^
          System.out.println("Error: "+ e.getMessage())
     ^~^
          System.out.println("Finally...")
     ^
}}}


===Try/Catch:===

The sign of Catch is "^^":
{{{
     e ^
          "".substring(0, -1)
     ^^
          System.out.println("Error: "+ e.getMessage())
     ^
}}}

===Try/Finally:===

The sign of finally is "^~^" and can use the error variable.
{{{
     e ^
          "".substring(0, -1)
     ^~^
          System.out.println("Finally..."+ e.getMessage())
     ^
}}}
